Title: Persona
Plot: Benson finds herself going the extra mile to protect a woman abused by her spouse. The investigation turns up information regarding a long-forgotten case of 2nd degree murder and escape.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual themes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Tim Miller, Joe Novellino, Lily Mercer, Kelly Bishop, Didi Conn, Brenda Blethyn, Mike Farrell, Nathaniel Marston, Clea DuVall, Erica Bradshaw
